_header: Of our five wits a well witting

BLHar7322.Transcription: of vr vife wittes a wel witiyngeof þing þat vs egget a vast vleyngeand of þe laste ende a bisi biþenkynge
BLHar7322.Note: Added to lower margin of the leaf.
